name: corrosion

effect.scarlet_violet: This Pokémon's moves and item ignore the usual immunity of Poison and Steel Pokémon when attempting to inflict poison.
effect.the_teal_mask: This Pokémon's moves and item ignore the usual immunity of Poison and Steel Pokémon when attempting to inflict poison.
effect.the_indigo_disk: This Pokémon's moves and item ignore the usual immunity of Poison and Steel Pokémon when attempting to inflict poison.

short_effect: This Pokémon can inflict poison on Poison and Steel Pokémon.

flavor_text.scarlet_violet: The Pokémon can poison the target even if it's a Steel or Poison type.
